features.sub_title: Surprise your loved one with a personalized book full of your memories

step_one.title: 1. Fill out the form
step_one.description: Follow the steps by filling out the form with your information

step_two.title: 2. Secure payment
step_two.description: Make your payment securely using Credit Card or PIX

step_three.title: 3. We generate your QR code and link
step_three.description: You will receive a QR code and a link via email to access the personalized page

step_four.title: 4. Send it to your special person
step_four.description: Make a surprise by sharing the link or QR code

CTA.tittle: Be the first to create your
CTA.sub_title: Get ahead! Pre-save and gain access to the system before anyone else
CTA.description: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

question_one.question: When will ProductX be available?
question_one.response: ProductX will be officially launched in Q3 2024. Pre-order customers will get early access starting Q2 2024.

question_two.question: What payment methods do you accept?
question_two.response: We accept all major credit and debit cards through Mercado Pago, our secure payment processor. Multiple payment options are available depending on your location.

question_three.question: Can I cancel my pre-order?
question_three.response: Yes, you can cancel your pre-order at any time before the product launch and receive a full refund. Contact our support team for assistance.

question_four.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
question_four.response: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee starting from the day you get access to ProductX. If you're not satisfied, we'll provide a full refund.

question_five.question: What kind of support is included?
question_five.response: All plans include email support. Pro and Enterprise plans include priority support with faster response times and dedicated support channels.

question_six.question: Is there a difference between pre-order and regular pricing?
question_six.response: Yes, pre-order customers get special early-bird pricing that's locked in for the first year. Regular pricing will be higher after the official launch.

question_seven.question: Do you offer enterprise-specific features?
question_seven.response: Yes, our Enterprise plan includes custom features, dedicated account management, and special deployment options. Contact our sales team for details.

question_eght.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
question_eght.response: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. We'll prorate the difference and apply it to your new plan.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Get in touch with our team to clarify your main questions.

register.title: Sign Up
register.description: Sign up to secure early access to the Bookly system and get exclusive coupons.
register.message_observation: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

SuccessPage.title: Successfully Added!
SuccessPage.description: Thank you for your pre-order. We will contact you soon with more details.
